comments: Collected plnts in Haiti for Emp. Francisco I of Austria for Herb. (W). Heterostachys ritteriana is named for him. Born Lungwitz bei Dresden.
examples: Atriplex halimus Ritter ex Moq. Prodr. (DC.) 13(2): 110. 1849 [5 May 1849]
source: Jimenénez, José de Jesús, Colectores Pl. Hispaniola: 145-146 (1985)
